title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Manchester Airports Group: Scaling operations with Agentic AI & MCP (SPS327)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 曼彻斯特机场集团：使用 Agentic AI 和 MCP 扩展运营 (SPS327)
abstract: Airport operations demand 24/7 workforce coordination across thousands of employees managing critical safety functions. Dive deep into how Manchester Airports Group built an AI-enabled Digital Colleague Workplace using Model Context Protocol, an agentic Amazon Bedrock AgentCore architecture and Amazon Bedrock foundation models. Examine advanced implementation patterns including agentic guardrails and compliance mechanisms for high-risk employment scenarios. This serverless solution processes text/speech interactions with 90%+ consistency in absence data capture, automatically validating requests and posting to rostering systems while reducing operational costs across multiple locations.
abstract_cn: 机场运营需要全天候协调数千名员工管理关键安全功能。深入了解曼彻斯特机场集团如何使用模型上下文协议、代理式 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 架构和 Amazon Bedrock 基础模型构建 AI 驱动的数字同事工作场所。研究高级实施模式，包括针对高风险就业场景的代理式护栏和合规机制。这个无服务器解决方案处理文本/语音交互，在缺勤数据捕获方面保持 90% 以上的一致性，自动验证请求并发布到排班系统，同时降低多个地点的运营成本。

presenter.name: Tom Chester
presenter.title: Senior AI Strategist, Generative AI Innovation Center
